title: Don’t risk your sticks!
description:
We just released our brand new Sticklocks! They fit on to the joysticks of your controller/console and lock them in place so that they don't get bumped around while travelling with them.

Buy Sticklocks using the link below:
https://www.lttstore.com/products/sticklocks
